title: Get Member
description: Get Member. This operation is used to get the profile information of a organization member that is associated to an account from Oracle Commerce

memberId.description: The ID of the requested shopper profile.

expand.description: This field determines the additional properties to be returned. Possible value for this query parameter is ‘accessRights’ to include accessRights of the organization member profile.

includedRoles.description: This field determines if only organizational roles or all roles are to be returned for the organization member profile. Default value is 'organizationalRolesForCurrentOrganization’. Possible values are 'organizationalRolesForCurrentOrganization’, 'allRolesForCurrentOrganization’.
